name: TerribleNight
description:
WASD - Move
Mouse Click - Control Camera

As a member of the Church, you are tasked with slaying beasts. A deadly encounter with one such beast has left you injured and cursed! Navigate the maze-like city and proceed to the Church in time before your lycanthropy takes complete control!

Made for the KO!! Slam-Jam 2023. This is my first Game Jam I've completed. Thank you for playing!

Themes chosen:

  • 120 Seconds: You have two minutes to succeed before it's Game Over
  • Transition: After one minute passes, your transformation begins! You gain a speed boost too!

Programming, Models, and Animations
Pettanko Neko

Music
https://alkakrab.itch.io/game-piano-music-pack
